@MrDanielBaker There isn’t a huge amount of WW1 specific literature on this subject but your friend should definitely look at Cheryl Buckley’s paper ‘Dehumanised Females & Amazonians’. I’d also recommend ‘British Popular Culture & the First World War’ (ed. @thehistorygirl1) for some context!

I passed my PhD viva today! I’m beyond thrilled and really grateful to my examiners Dr Jane Tynan & Dr Ian Anderson for a super engaging discussion. This evening I will be toasting the women of #WW1 for dressing so damn well. 🍻
